21.title: Waiting torrent push from user
21.description: No torrent provider setup. Please configure one or manually push torrent file

22.title: Looking for torrent from torrent provider
22.description: No torrent file found for moment on your torrent provider(s)

30.title: Download in progress
30.description: Torrent file found and added to your torrent client. Download is in progress

33.title: Download paused
33.description: Download is paused on your torrent provider. Please have a look on it then restart

35.title: Download achieved. To be transfered
35.description: Torrent client achieved download. Transfer in progress

39.title: Download completed
39.description: File download & transfer achieved. Next episode will be scheduled

90.title: Tv Show achieved
90.description: No next episode scheduled for broadcast for moment. Waiting for next episode announcement
